Identification.LongTitle: Order Prescribing a Basic Rate for the Purposes of Section 33 of the Expropriation Act

Section.Text: This Order may be cited as the Expropriation Act Basic Rate Order.
For the purpose of section 33 of the Expropriation Act, the basic rate shall be

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: for any period ending on or before September 30, 1973, six per cent per annum; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: for any quarterly period commencing after September 30, 1973

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: six per cent per annum, or

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: equal to the average yield of Government of Canada treasury bills for the period of four weeks preceding the quarterly period, where that average yield does not contain a fraction other than a multiple of one-quarter, or

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: calculated to the nearest quarter of one per cent above the average yield described in clause (A), where that average yield contains a fraction other than a multiple of one-quarter,
